grails.plugin.cache.web
[Java] Class Header

java.lang.Object
  grails.plugin.cache.web.Header
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Header

Generic implementation of a HTTP header. Handles String, Int and Date typed headers. Based on net.sf.ehcache.constructs.web.Header.

Authors:
Eric Dalquist
Burt Beckwith

Nested Class Summary
enum Header.Type

Used to help differentiate the different header types
